root: ^Me：...what happened next?<color=green>(click on any spot at the dialogue window or press SPACE to continue story.)</color>
^Me：The dream seemed so vivid, but it isn't coming back to me. <color=green>(Press [H] or [↑] to review chat transcript.)</color>
^Me：It feels like something so important though, worth lying in bed and recollecting over and over again.
^Me：...Despite that, I'm hungry and my stomach hurts. Let's get out of bed first.
^Me：Shit, the room's empty! There's only a table and a mattress left.
^Me：All my cash is gone, are you kidding me?
^Me：What the hell happened? Did a burglar get in while I was asleep? Or did I...holy shit...
^Me：How long have I slept? It was Monday the last time I checked. What was I doing? Shit, my head is a mess...
^Me：That's a norm though. Every day's a repetition, painting half-finished work that I just can't get right, or just blindly wasting time.
^Me：Why did I move to this town in the first place? For the scenery? Welp, now it's just days and nights in a rented room.
^Me：But this feeling of emptiness is also kinda unique life experience, isn't it? (Inspired!)
